versiculos.texto: kani'ukiratsitikaitiniri, pikaheuxikakai tsepa waikawa memika'ikaritiwakai yaxeikia katineuhaitikaitini. [cite: 2154]
'Ayumieme 'iparewiwamete mipai mekatenitahiawe: «Xeime 'uka 'iimari yuxewime tepikuwauni para matsi'iwiyaniki, meta 'a'aurie mutihupuniki mimatsi'utixiriyaniki». [cite: 2156]
Hiki miki mekaniukakine naitsarie 'ixaher- itsixi wahetsia 'uka mekuwautiweti witsimi'ane, mekanitaxeiya 'Awitsahaki Tsunemi kiekariyarit- sie kiekame, miki ti'aitame mekani'atiirieni. [cite: 2157]
Miki 'uka yemeki witsipitiyuxexeiyakai, ti'aitame pi'iwiyakai meta 'apirepiniriwakai tita mireuyehiakai, peru ti'aitame miki hatsuaku pika'ikumayia. [cite: 2158]

Merikitsi 'Aruniyaxi Rawiri nu'aya Kakiti matia memeyexei, kaniuyukuha'aritiani mipai 'utaiti: «Ti'aitame nepayani». 'Ayumieme yuwaikawame kaniwarukuxeirieni kuyaxi. Kaxetate kuyaxa miemete meta kawayutsixi kaniwarukuxeirieni meta huta tewiyari heimana tamamata kuyaxi 'ihiwemete. [cite: 2159, 2160]
'Aruniyaxi pitemaikitikai 'aixia pitiyuxexeiyakai yaki puyumaikai 'Awitsaruni 'utia mieme pihikitikai. Paapaya Rawiri hatsuaku pika'ita'imaiyaxi kemitiyurienekai 'Aruniyaxi. [cite: 2161]
'Ayumieme 'Aruniyaxi Kuhawi Tsariwiya nu'aya matia mekatenikuxatakaitini 'awie meta mawari wewiwame hamatia 'Awiyataxi, mikita mekaniparewieni. [cite: 2165]
'Ikita 'Aruniyaxi memika'uparewi mepihikitikai mawari wewiwame Tsaruki meta Wenahiyaxi Kuyara nu'aya, Natani Kakaiyari niukameya, Tsimi meta Xeki meta Rawiri kuyaximama memikamama. [cite: 2166]

Hiki 'Aruniyaxi 'Enixukeri haixayari 'aurie katiniutimawa, Tsukereti 'aiyari manukatsie, mana tsikerutsixi memiwaiyatika, tuurutsixi meta muxatsi mekaniwarutimawa. Yu'iwama kaniwaruta'inieni ti'aitame niwemama memi'iwamamatikaiki meta yunaime paratsiyuta te'uximayatamete, Kura kwieyaritsie miemete, [cite: 2167, 2168]
peru Natani Kakaiyari niukameya pika'uta'ini, Wenahiyaxi meta ti'aitame kuyaximama memikamama, meta yu'iwa Tsarumuni pika'uta'ini. [cite: 2169]
'Ayumieme Natani Tsarumuni maamaya Wetitsawe, mipai katiniuta'iwawiya: «¿Mipai petimateri, 'Aruniyaxi Kakiti nu'aya ti'aitame mayuyeitiaxime, 'atsikatimaikaku?» [cite: 2170, 2171, 2172]
Xika tati'aitiwame pehauyuwikweitsitiamikini Rawiri meta 'aniwe Tsarumuni pehauwikweitsitiamikini, keneneupitia mipai nemimatitaxatianiki: [cite: 2173, 2174, 2175, 2176, 2177, 2178]

Kenemie ti'aitame Rawiri hetsia, mipai ketinetahiawi: «¿Tami ne mati'uximayatsiriwame mipai pepinetiuhiritia, kename neniwe Tsarumuni ti'aitame 'ayanikekai 'a'utima? ¿Kepautiti hiki 'Aruniyaxi ti'aitame pihiki?» [cite: 2179]
Mexi 'eki perekuxatani Rawiri hamatia neta nepautahani para neta yaxeikia nemireitahiaweki». [cite: 2183]
Merikite Wetitsawe kaneutahani ti'aitame muyehupu. Mikiri waikawa mi'ukiratsitikaiki 'Awitsahaki pi'iwiyakai Tsunemi kiekame. [cite: 2184]
Wetitsawe kepauka muwa munua kaniukatunumakeni hixiena. Hiki ti'aitame mipai katinita'iwawiya: [cite: 2185]
-¿Ketitaki nematiparewieni? [cite: 2187]
Hiki Wetitsawe mipai katinita'eiya: -Neti'aitiwame yapepinetiutahiawixi mati'uximayatsiriwame, Yawé mi'akakaiyari matsi'eniekaku kename neniwe Tsarumuni ti'aitame 'ayanikekai 'a'utima. [cite: 2188]
Peru hiki matsi 'Aruniyaxi pita ti'aitame payuyeitiaxime, 'eki 'atsipekatimaikaku yuri ti'aitame pemihiki. [cite: 2189]

Mikiri mawari kanewewieni turutsixi, tsikerutsixi meta muxatsi kaniwarekwini yumiireme. Hiki kaniwaruta'inieni yunaime ti'aitame 'aniwema, mawari wewiwame 'Awiyataxi meta Kuhawi kuyaxi tiwa'aitiwame. Peru Tsarumuni pika'uta'ini 'aixia mimati'uximayatsirie. [cite: 2190, 2191]
Hiki neti'aitiwame meta ti'aitame, yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi mekanita'ikwewani yapemitayiniki, kemi'ane mitita'aita 'a'utima 'a'uwenitsie mayerini. [cite: 2192]
Mexika 'eki yapekatayiweti pe'umini, matsi kwitiwa 'Aruniyaxi pitatsikwini ne meta neniwe Tsarumuni matia 'axateyuruwamete wahepai. [cite: 2193]
Mexi 'akuxi Wetitsawe tikuxatakai ti'aitame hamatia, Natani Kakaiyari niukameya kaninuani. [cite: 2194]
Ti'aitame katinetimani kepauka munua. Hiki Natani hixiena 'utihiximakeka, [cite: 2198]
mipai Rawiri katiniutahiawe: -Neti'aitiwame. ¿'Eki mipai petiuta'ai kename 'Aruniyaxi 'anukakeni 'a'utima? [cite: 2199]

Mipai nekamatina'iwawiyani yanetimaiti miki mawari mewewiki yumiireme, turutsixi, muxatsi meta tsikerutsixi memiwaiyatika. Meta yunaime 'aniwema kaniwaruta'inieni, kuyaxi tewa'aitiwamete, meta mawari wewiwame 'Awiyataxi mana miki yunaiti mekatenekwaka mekane'ieka, mipai mete'uhiwati hixiena: 'Ti'aitame 'Aruniyaxi yuheyemeki keti'aitani'. [cite: 2200, 2201]
Peru ne pikanetsi'uta'ini 'ahetsiemieme nemiti'uximaya, yaxeikia mawari wewi- wame Tsaruki meta Wenahiyaxi Kuyara nu'aya meta Tsarumuni pika'uta'ini 'aixia mimati'uximayatsirie. [cite: 2202]
¿Kamitsi 'eki mipai petiuta'ai, tame mate'uximayatsiriwamete yapekatarahiaweti, kemi'ane 'a'utima 'a'uwenitsie mayerinikekai? [cite: 2203, 2204]
Merikitsi mipai tiu'enaka, ti'aitame Rawiri mipai katiniuta'aita: -Xekenewata'ini Wetitsawe. Miki kaneutayani ti'aitame hixie kaniutakeni. [cite: 2207, 2208]
Hiki ti'aitame mipai katinitahiawe: -Yuriki Yawé hixie mipai nekanaineni, minetsi'uxinaxi naime 'uximatiarika hepaitsita, [cite: 2209]
hiki nekaneye'atiamiki kenemimatiutahiawixi Yawé 'ixaheritsixi takakaiyari hixie. Hiki yanepitiyurieni ne kenemimatiutahiawixi, [cite: 2210]

'aniwe Tsarumuni ti'aitame payani ne'utima, nehetsiemieme pitita'aita. Hiki Wetitsawe ti'aitame hixie 'utihiximakeka, mipai kaniutayini: -Neti'aitiwame meta ti'aitame Rawiri 'aheye- meki peke'ayeyurini. [cite: 2213, 2214, 2215, 2216, 2217, 2218, 2219, 2220, 2221]
'Ana Rawiri mipai katiniuta'aita: -Xekenewata'ini mawari wewiwame Tsaruki, meta Natani Kakaiyari niukameya metatsiere We- nahiyaxi Kuyara nu'aya. [cite: 2223]

Hiki kepauka miki yuhaikati memu'axia ti'aitame hixie, ti'aitame mipai katiniwarutahiawe: -Xekeniwara'inieti memite'uximaya, neniwe paratsiyuta Tsarumuni xekenanutiyetsa nemuratsie, hiki xekenanuwitiki Kikuni haixayari matiniere paiti, [cite: 2224, 2225, 2226, 2227, 2228, 2229, 2230, 2231, 2232]

muwa mawari wewiwame Tsaruki meta Natani Kakaiyari niukameya hatseiti witsimu'ia mekaneikawirieni Kikuni paiti. Muwa paiti mekaneitsutiani teiteri me'utihiwati temawierikaki meta kiekaritsie yaxeikia mepeyuxeirie. 'Ayumieme miki hiwari kana'eniiriikini. [cite: 2233, 2234]
Metatsiere 'ari Tsarumuni ti'aitame 'uweniey- atsie kanayerini, [cite: 2236]

meta paratsiyuta te'uximayatamete tati'aitiwame Rawiri mekaneiwairitiatiwekaitini matsi Mipai paiti miyamitiuyuriki. mekateneikihiawekaitini Kakaiyari Tsarumuni matsi waikawa mariweme kehayeitiani keyuri Rawiri, meta matsi mariwemeki ketiuta'aita keyuri Rawiri. [cite: 2237, 2238, 2239, 2240]

Hiki ti'aitame Rawiri mipai rahiawariwati yu'utatsie 'akaiti kananakatutsire hiki mipai kanetayini: 'Aixia kerahiawariwani Yawé 'ixaheritsixi takakaiyari, hiki minetsi'upitia nemixeiyaki ne'utima mitita'aita, ne'uwenitsie 'akaime'. [cite: 2244]
Hiki mipai mete'u'enanaka, yunaiti 'Aruniyaxi 'inierimama me'anuku'uka mekaneutayeixiani waikawa memamati. [cite: 2245, 2272]
'Aruniyaxi, waikawa Tsarumuni makati, 'ix- uriki tukiyari manuwe kaneuyuta'una, mawari wewiwame 'awateyatsie katinawiyakaitini. [cite: 2273]

Hiki yapauka ti'aitame Tsarumuni mipai pitiutaxatiarie: -Ti'aitame, 'Aruniyaxi kamenimakaka, 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe mawari wewiwame 'awateyat- sie katinawiyani. Mipai 'utaiti: 'Hiki kwitiwa mipai kehetayini ti'aitame Tsarumuni kename ne kanetsimieni ti'uximayatsiriwame'. [cite: 2274, 2275, 2276]
Hiki Tsarumuni mipai kaniutayini: -Xika yuhemeki heitserie 'a'uyeikani, ni'atsipikaranuyeyani, peru xika tixaiti tiuyurieni 'uxa'atini, kanimieriemiki. [cite: 2277]
Hiki ti'aitame Tsarumuni katiniutani'ani miwitikiemieki. Kepauka 'Aruniyaxi munua, kaniutihiximakeni ti'aitame Tsarumuni hixie, hiki miki kanitani'ani yukie miyemieki. [cite: 2278]
Hiki Rawiri kanimiximekaitini, 'ayumieme yu- niwe Tsarumuni mipai katiniuhiritiani: [cite: 2281]
«Teyunaiti yaxeikia miiya pitatsiheutakwewie, neri 'etsiwa xeikia peuyewetse nemiminiki. Kene'atirikariyani, pepikaheumaka 'uki muka'iyari kenehikitini. 'aitsikayatsie [cite: 2282, 2283, 2284]

Yawé 'akakaiyari yaketinekamieni huyeya keneuweiyani meta Muitsexi naime 'iniari niukiyaritsie kemiraka'utia. Mipai 'ana tsepa kepemitiyuriene 'aixia pepitiukaxexeiyani meta tsepa hakewa pemetia, [cite: 2285, 2289]

Yawé, kaneye'atiamiki 'ipai keminetiutahiawixi: 'Xika 'anuiwarima 'aixia mete'u'uwani, xika yu'iyariki yametekahuni, mipai 'anuiwarima xeikia mepanuti'uweni 'ixaheritsixi metewa'aitiati'. [cite: 2291, 2292]

»'Eki pepitimate, kemitiuyuri Kuhawi Tsariwiya nu'aya, miki kuyaxi miyianeni hepai pitiuyuri kayuwati 'umakakutiti, 'Awinexi Nexi nu'aya meta 'Amatsaha Ketexi nu'aya, miki yuhutame puwarukwi kuyaxi tewa'aitiwamete ixaheritsixi, mipai miki yuhetsie pirahia. [cite: 2294]
'Ayumieme, ketinemaiweni, 'apikareutewini 'ena 'uyeikati, pepika'ihayewani kayuwati hex- eiyati muminiki. [cite: 2295]

Matsi 'aixia ketiniwaxeiyani Waxitsirahi niwemama Karaha kiekame, miki 'amexatsie keniwapitiaka 'ahamatia memitekwaniki, mikitsi neheima mekaniutanuani kepauka 'a'iwa minetsi'uweiyakai 'Awitsaruni. [cite: 2296]

»Yaxeikiata nepimatsiyetuirie Tsimi Kera nu'aya, Wenikamini xiiyarieya Wakurini kiekame, waikawa 'axapinetiutihiawixi Makanahini ne'umiekaku. Kurutani kepauka Kaniyuritinita hatuxameyaritsie minetsihekunakixi, ne Yawé hixie mipai nekatineitahiawe kename [cite: 2297, 2298, 2299, 2300, 2301, 2302]
'Ayumiemeri 'eki pepikareiyehiwirieka. 'Eki pepitimaiwe, 'ekiri matsi waikawa kepemiyurieneni, tsepa mi'ukiratsiri keneuta'aita mimierieniki».
Hiki Rawiri kaniumini, kaniukateukieni yukiekaritsie hepaina mititewatsie yu'ukiyarima wahamatia. [cite: 2309, 2311]

Hewuruni kiekariyaritsie piti'aitametikai 'atahuta wiyari, Kerutsareme hetsieta xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika wiyari, naimekiri pitiuta'aitaxi huta tewiyari wiyari, 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie. [cite: 2314]
'Utimana mitiuta'aitaxi nu'aya kanayani Tsarumuni, hiki miki tirikaiyemeki katiniuta'aita. [cite: 2315]
Tsarumuni tirikaiyemeki kemitiuta'ai Hiki 'Aruniyaxi Kakiti nu'aya petia Wetitsawe Tsarumuni maamaya hetsia, Wetitsawe mipai katinita'iwawiya: -¿Petinua pekanetsi'aye'unieti? [cite: 2316, 2317]
'Aruniyaxi mipai katinita'eiya: -Huu, tixaiti nepirayexeiya nepimatitaxatiani. Wetitsawe mipai katinitahiawe: -Kenetineutaxatia. [cite: 2318, 2319, 2320]

'Aruniyaxi mipai kaniutayini: -Kamitsi 'eki pekatinimaika, nepita ti'aitame nekanayanikekaitini, yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi mipai mekateniku'eriwakaitini. Peru hikiri nemuta pita katiniunakitsitiani, Yawé kemitinake katiniuyini. [cite: 2321, 2322]
'Aixiatsi kani'aneni, peru tixaiti nepimatitawawirieni, perutsi pekati- naye'atiamiki. Wetitsawe mipai katinitahiawe: -¿Kekuta petayini? [cite: 2323, 2324, 2325, 2326, 2327, 2328]
'Aruniyaxi mipai katinitahiawe: -Ximixi, 'eki mipai ketinetahiawi ti'aitame Tsarumuni, kenetsi'uwititiani 'Awitsahaki Tsunemi kiekame, 'eki yapereitahiaweyu pimatsi'anu'enieni. [cite: 2329, 2330]
Wetitsawe mɨpaɨ katinita'eiya: —'Aixɨa kani'aneni, nepɨreitaxatɨani ti'aitame kepemaine. [cite: 2331]

Hikɨ Wetitsawe kaneyani ti'aitame Tsarumuni hetsɨa, mɨpaɨ mɨtitaxatɨanikɨ 'Aruniyaxi hetsiemieme. Ti'aitame kananukukeni mitahɨawekɨ yuwarutsi hɨxie kananakatutsire, hikɨ 'itahɨaweka kanayerɨni yu'uwenitsie, kanita'aitata tawari xeime 'uweni mana mayerɨnikɨ maamaya, hikɨ tserietana kaniutiyerɨni. [cite: 2332, 2333]

Wetitsawe mɨpaɨ katinitahɨawe: —Ximɨxi 'etsiwa nepɨmatitawawirienikeyu, peru yemekɨ yaketinekaye'a. Tsarumuni mɨpaɨ yumaama katiniuta'eiya: —Yakeneutayɨki tita pemɨtixata, nemaama 'aku, 'ekɨ tixaɨtɨkɨ nepɨkamatita'imaiya. [cite: 2334]
Maamaya mɨpaɨ kaniutayɨni: —Keneupitɨa 'a'iwa 'Aruniyaxi 'Awitsahaki Tsunemi kiekame mɨtiwitɨnikɨ. [cite: 2335]
Hikɨ ti'aitame yumaama mɨpaɨ katiniu tahɨawe: —Peru neuxei ¿titayari penetiwawirie 'Awitsahaki '
